message: One whole day of interviews down, and hopefully some phone calls -- who is in so far?
does anyone have any idea how big the YC summer 2011 class is supposed to be?
@jwang815 awesome...congrats guys!

we're not :( major bummer but we scared them off with natural language processing as a possible feature. We're going to keep going though and even got unsolicited job offers from other YC companies! Good luck to everyone else. http://stacyplease.com

We just did our interview; stressful 13 minutes (although actually a lot easier than I expected, and easier than some meetings I've had).  They were surprised I now have 2 cofounders since I applied as single founder.  Hopefully no emails today, only calls!
awww, sorry to hear that @alabut
@octal I'm rooting for ya!
good luck @octal!
ours was pretty tailored; no social media, virality, etc. questions; it was all focused on "what are you building" "who is the market" "why do they need it".
@ericflo Thanks!  I also got to meet the elusive third Convore team member :)
@octal nice :)
that sucks @alabut, will keep an eye on your app though!
for those who have already had their interviews: did they ask any generic questions? i.e., what's your market size, who's your competitors, etc or were the questions more tailored to your app/biz?

In general I am quite happy with the interview process (obviously if they say yes I'll be even happier); they were only 5 minutes behind schedule.  Possibly they could have more food in the green room?  It was awesome meeting even more YC alums (280 North, Convore, something else).  It might be nice if alums vs. applicants were more clearly identified (like name tags for the alums?)
I take it you've had your interview @jasonmccay, do you know if you guys have gotten in or not yet?

The questions can flow quickly and it keeps you talking. My advice would be to have 3-4 main points that you want to convey (as in Twitter size or less) and know that amidst all the conversation, make sure you offer these throughout the conversation. It goes without saying, but they are not magically going to know what you desire to convey to them. :)
& thanks for the advice btw :)
Good luck man, hope you guys get in. Our interview is tomorrow at 3pm
@simonify We went at 9:30 this morning...I thought it went pretty good. When are you guys up?
@octal Congrats!!
In.
congrats @octal :)
Got the good news this evening. Really excited.
@jasonmccay Congrats.  If they didn't take you guys I would have been wtf :)
@jasonmccay congrats dude!
@jasonmccay I told you so :) congrats
@jasonmccay congrats!
@simonify @martin_sunset @dnguyen @octal Thanks guys for all the well-wishes!
@jasonmccay congrats! That's great news. Have a great house hunting weekend!
Househunting is my least favorite part of YC so far.
@octal No kidding...today has proven very tough.
@octal - congrats!
@jasonmccay - congrats!
@simonify @ericflo thanks guys, looking forward to hanging out in meatspace this summer
and congrats to @jasonmccay too, mongohq looks awesome and we're queued up as beta testers :)
@octal congrats dude, you were pretty confident at the dinner last Friday and I'm glad to see it paid off.
@Octal Congrats!! @all: free SurveyShare Pro Unlimited accounts to any YC S11 teams who want one. Email Andy, andy@surveyshare.com if interested!
congratulations jason!

Hi all, YC alumn looking for a roommate, walking distance from YC. Spacious digs, nice big kitchen, super affordable. PM me if you're trying to find a place! (also there are great apartments here in my complex, super convenient and cheap!)
I can vouch for @Cole - he's an awesome guy and makes some sweet ios games
@Cole what complex is it?
@awfy Its a 6 unit apartment building near Bernardo st, just across the sunnyvale line. About a 15 min walk to YC. I'd prefer not to post my address here though. DM me for details.
